topic.title: How to Make a Part of My Document Xincluded?

section.p: It is also possible to make a portion of your document a separate Xincluded document. For this:

li.p: Select the portion you want to convert to Xincluded document.

note.p: Note that only the selection that contains single element (that possibly has children or text) or text-only selections are convertible to xincluded portions.

li.p: In the Convert to XInclude Dialog choose the file name for new xincluded document.
You may also change/add XInclude attributes. Hit Attributes... button for the XInclude Attributes Dialog.
Click OK . The xincluded document will show up in xinclude brackets.
